title: The Bohemian girl
creator_credit: Hal Roach, James W. Horne and Charles Rogers
brief_description: A tale of gypsies who kidnap a nobleman’s daughter and bring her up as their own. When they return years later, the girl is wrongly blamed for stealing from her father’s house. Based on the operetta by Balfe, this comedy adaptation stars Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy with Thelma Todd, Antonio Moreno, Jacqueline Wells, James Finlayson.
